sentence: In recent weeks, the most virulent example of this hasn't come from likely culprits Donald Trump or Florida's Republican governor cursed with permanent constipation face, Ron DeSantis.
author: Amanda Marcotte
title: Amber Heard on trial: Johnny Depp's defamation case is radicalizing young men
